attributes.action: Invite the Australian Government to advise the uk on borders and security
attributes.additional_details: Because Australia is a shining example of how they put the safety and security of their own citizens before a misplaced philanthropy and belief that one, such as the uk, should put unknown persons before the safety and security of their own citizens.
attributes.background: Listen to uk citizens who have genuine concerns about the safety and security of it's borders and country
